comment: Solid IB Caol Ila, flavorful yet light on the palate. Good briny character.

Excellent IB peated Caol Ila. Light nose of seasalt, brine, seaweed, ash and light peat smoke. Nice body that feels both light and oily at different times. Taste reminds me of ardbeg. With fairly heavy smoke into lighter medicinal and lemony notes with a nice lingering salty finish.
